payload.llm_output:
- Make sure to extract only the relevant features from the given input. Avoid including any irrelevant information.
- Ensure that the extracted features are accurate and match the given product description.
- Try to extract as many features as possible, within the given range of 5 to 15.
- Make sure to provide the source of each feature, whether it's from the title, part number, or manufacturer.
- Ensure that the units are normalized and consistent across all features.
- Avoid restating the part number, brand, or model as feature names.
- Avoid including any use cases, benefits, or application contexts in the features.
